boardgame.name: Airlines Europe
Alan R. Moon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Airlines Europe
Linie Lotnicze Europa
Авиалинии Европы
エアライン・ヨーロッパ
boardgame.description: Before Ticket to Ride, before Santa Fe Rails, before Union Pacific _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; yet after Acquire _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; there was Airlines, one of the earliest published games from designer Alan R. Moon and publisher ABACUSSPIELE._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;More than two decades after the publication of that game, Moon and ABACUSSPIELE present Airlines Europe, the design of which Moon began in 2007. According to the publisher, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;He wanted to preserve the feel of the original game and its successor, Union Pacific, while confronting the player with even more exciting choices._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; The result of that redesign process is Airlines Europe, featuring a reduced playing time, a new point structure, a European setting, and 112 tiny detailed airplanes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At its heart, Airlines Europe is a stock game, with players earning points for the stock they hold in particular airline companies when one of the randomly determined scorings takes place. On a player's turn, that player either expands an airline and claims a stock, plays stock onto the board and receives dividend, invests in a special airline called Air ABACUS or gets a certain amount of money from the bank. A player scores only for stock in play, but the value of an airline is determined by the value of the route licenses that airline owns _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; thus, you're torn in terms of what to play when._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Some changes compared to Airlines:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; map of Europe_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; no flight cards _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; special Air ABACUS airline similar to the Union Pacific _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; share track system_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; separate victory point and money systems_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; airplane miniatures_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; no sabotage _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; up to 5 players_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; reduced playtime_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Some changes compared to Union Pacific:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; airplane theme_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; map of Europe_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; no track cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Air ABACUS is acquired by trading in other shares_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; share track system _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; separate victory point and money systems_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; up to 5 players_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; reduced playtime _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implements:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Airlines_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Union Pacific_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Promo Expansions:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Airlines Europe: Flight Ban (adding the option to block routes)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Airlines Europe: New Bonus Connections (adding bonus connections for the black and the brown airline)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Airlines Europe: The Presidents (adds tie breaker for stock payouts)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Rio Grande Games (RIO 444) Number of players: 2-5 Age of players: 13+ Length: 75 minutes Game Description: The age of passenger aviation has begun. Courageous entrepreneurs establish the first airlines and compete for the few available licenses in the European air space. The rapidly growing market and the chance for high gains attract high-powered investors. But only the ones that use their influence skillfully and their cash wisely will turn their investments into the most profitable airlines.

Publisher: Rio Grande Games [RIO444] Number of Players: 2-5 Ages: 10+ Length: 75 minutes Shipping: Shipping rates will be determined upon sale or request. Insurance is optional but highly recommended for higher priced items. The shipping costs are NOT inflated. You pay exactly what I am charged for shipping, along with material costs. I ship through FedEx or USPS, whichever is cheaper. Normal shipping costs run from $8.00 - $11.00. If you have a commercial address that I can send to, your shipping costs will be even less! Payment: I accept PayPal, money orders, personal and cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s checks. Personal checks will be accepted but I will wait until the check has cleared before sending the item. Return Policy: I want you to be completely satisfied with your item. Because of this, I will accept return of any item for a refund of the purchase price within 30 days of the sale. The item must be in the same condition that it was sent. I cannot refund the shipping cost.

Rio Grande Games (RIO444) The age of passenger aviation has begun. Courageous entrepreneurs establish the first airlines and compete for the few available licenses in the European air space.
